com.esotericsoftware.kryo

Interface StreamFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultStreamFactory, FastestStreamFactory

    public interface StreamFactory
    Provides input and output streams based on system settings.
    Author:
    Roman Levenstein

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Input getInput()
      Creates an uninitialized Input.
      Input getInput(byte[] buffer)
      Creates a new Input for reading from a byte array.
      Input getInput(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)
      Creates a new Input for reading from a byte array.
      Input getInput(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
      Creates a new Input for reading from an InputStream with a buffer size of 4096.
      Input getInput(java.io.InputStream inputStream, int bufferSize)
      Creates a new Input for reading from an InputStream.
      Input getInput(int bufferSize)
      Creates a new Input for reading from a byte array.

      Creates an uninitialized Output.
      Output getOutput(byte[] buffer)
      Creates a new Output for writing to a byte array.

      Creates a new Output for writing to a byte array.

      Creates a new Output for writing to an OutputStream.

    • Method Detail

      • getInput

        Input getInput()
        Creates an uninitialized Input.

      • getInput

        Input getInput(int bufferSize)
        Creates a new Input for reading from a byte array.
        Parameters:
        bufferSize - The size of the buffer. An exception is thrown if more bytes than this are read.

      • getInput

        Input getInput(byte[] buffer)
        Creates a new Input for reading from a byte array.
        Parameters:
        buffer - An exception is thrown if more bytes than this are read.

      • getInput

        Input getInput(byte[] buffer,
             int offset,
             int count)
        Creates a new Input for reading from a byte array.
        Parameters:
        buffer - An exception is thrown if more bytes than this are read.

      • getInput

        Input getInput(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
        Creates a new Input for reading from an InputStream with a buffer size of 4096.

      • getInput

        Input getInput(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
             int bufferSize)
        Creates a new Input for reading from an InputStream.

      • getOutput

        Output getOutput()
        Creates an uninitialized Output. Output.setBuffer(byte[], int) must be called before the Output is used.

      • getOutput

        Output getOutput(int bufferSize)
        Creates a new Output for writing to a byte array.
        Parameters:
        bufferSize - The initial and maximum size of the buffer. An exception is thrown if this size is exceeded.

      • getOutput

        Output getOutput(int bufferSize,
               int maxBufferSize)
        Creates a new Output for writing to a byte array.
        Parameters:
        bufferSize - The initial size of the buffer.
        maxBufferSize - The buffer is doubled as needed until it exceeds maxBufferSize and an exception is thrown. Can be -1 for no maximum.

      • getOutput

        Output getOutput(byte[] buffer)
        Creates a new Output for writing to a byte array.
        See Also:
        Output.setBuffer(byte[])

      • getOutput

        Output getOutput(byte[] buffer,
               int maxBufferSize)
        Creates a new Output for writing to a byte array.
        See Also:
        Output.setBuffer(byte[], int)

      • getOutput

        Output getOutput(java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
        Creates a new Output for writing to an OutputStream. A buffer size of 4096 is used.

      • getOutput

        Output getOutput(java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
               int bufferSize)
        Creates a new Output for writing to an OutputStream.

      • setKryo

        void setKryo(Kryo kryo)
